headline: Jim Cramer on Steel Dynamics: “It’s an Excellent Company”
summary: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (NASDAQ:STLD) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his take on. Answering a caller’s query about the stock during the lightning round, Cramer said: It’s an excellent company. I like Steel Dynamics, and I like Nucor. Those are the two. Wow, what a terrific buy. headline: Is There Still Value In Nucor (NUE) After Its Strong Multi Year Share Price Run?
summary: If you are wondering whether Nucor's share price still offers value or if most of the opportunity is already priced in, the next sections will walk through what the current numbers are suggesting. Nucor's stock recently closed at US$181.65, with returns of 4.2% over the last 7 days, 9.8% over 30 days, 7.2% year to date, 51.1% over 1 year, 13.7% over 3 years, and 303.0% over 5 years. This naturally raises questions about how the current price lines up with underlying value. Recent coverage of...

headline: Assessing Nucor’s (NUE) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Nucor (NUE) is back on investors’ radar after recent gains, with the stock up 0.8% on the day and showing stronger returns over the past month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Nucor. That 0.8% move sits within a stronger trend, with a 30-day share price return of 9.8% and a 90-day share price return of 31.0%, while the 1-year total shareholder return sits at 51.1%. Together, these figures point to firm positive momentum. If Nucor’s run has you rethinking where steel fits in your...
